name: SensorInsight
0:
”Alexa Ask sensor insight to list the assets”
”Alexa Ask sensor insight to tell me the list of new events”
”Alexa Ask sensor insight to give me the list of humidity measurements”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sensor insight
des:
This skill is only for SensorInsight customers. If you would like to enable it for your organization, please contact a SensorInsight representative.

GETTING STARTED

To get started, select the Enable Skill button in the app to link your SensorInsight account. 

Make sure your SensorInsight account has the permissions to obtain assets, events and measurements. If the skill responds with the following message its because your account does not have the permissions to obtain either of those: "Looks like you do not have permissions to use the SensorInsight Alexa Skill. Please talk to your organization's administrator".

Here are some examples of things you can say:

Assets

Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the assets
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to tell me the assets
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to list the assets

Events

Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to tell me the events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to list the events

Events by status [new, in progress, pending, resolved]

Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the new events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the list of in progress events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to tell me the pending events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to list the resolved events

Events by priority [low, medium, high]

Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the low priority events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to tell me the list of medium priority events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to list the high priority events

Events by status and priority

Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the new high priority events
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to tell me the list of resolved medium priority events

Measurements by measurement name

Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the temperature measurements
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to tell me the list of humidity measurements
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to list the air pressure measurements

Measurements by measurement name and duration

Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to give me the list of temperature measurements sent the last two hours
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to tell me the luminosity measurements sent the last day
Alexa, Ask SensorInsight to list the humidity measurements sent the last five minutes
